latex:
Let a sequence $\{u_n\}$ be defined by $u_1=5$ and the relation $u_{n+1}-u_n=3+4(n-1)$, $n=1,2,3,\cdots$.  If $u_n$ is expressed as a polynomial in $n$, the algebraic sum of its coefficients is:\\
\\
$\textbf{(A) }3\qquad
\textbf{(B) }4\qquad
\textbf{(C) }5\qquad
\textbf{(D) }6\qquad
\textbf{(E) }11$
